text: George Bernard Kauffman (September 4, 1930 - May 2, 2020) was an American chemist and educator. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Kauffman was a Professor of Chemistry at California State University, Fresno. In 1978, Kauffman was honored with the Dexter Award from the American Chemical Society. He was a Guggenheim Fellow. Kauffman died on May 2, 2020 at his home in Fresno, California at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American historians Category:American chemists Category:California State University faculty Category:Scientists from Philadelphia Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Scientists from Fresno, California Category:Educators from Philadelphia Category:Writers from Fresno, California
title: George Kauffman
